edu.smcm.ai.search

Class UniformCostSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.smcm.ai.search.Search
      • edu.smcm.ai.search.UniformCostSearch
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStar

    public class UniformCostSearch
extends Search
    Implementation of the Uniform Cost Search. See Russell and Norvig, Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, Third Edition, p 84. The frontier is represented using both a PriorityQueue and a Map<State, Node> to make determining membership quicker.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • frontierQueue

        protected void frontierQueue(java.util.PriorityQueue<Node> frontier_queue)
        Replace the frontier queue with another. This allows the Uniform Costs Search to be transformed into another search that orders the frontier queue differently.
        Parameters:
        frontier_queue - new frontier queue

      • nodesGenerated

        public int nodesGenerated()
        Get the number of nodes generated in this search.
        Specified by:
        nodesGenerated in class Search
        Returns:
        number of nodes generated

      • search

        public java.util.List<Action> search(Problem problem)
        Perform a Uniform Cost Search. Pseudocode for this method can be found in Russell and Norvig, Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, Third Edition, p. 84. Note that the frontier is made up of both a priority queue and a has table.
        Specified by:
        search in class Search
        Parameters:
        problem - problem to be solved
        Returns:
        list of the actions necessary to solve the problem
